name: @sidewayss/elements
description: Autonomous custom HTML elements with external template files

scripts.build:rm: npx shx rm -r dist && npx shx rm cem.js
scripts.build:cp: npx shx mkdir dist/templates && npx shx cp templates/* dist/templates && npx shx cp apps/*.png dist/apps && npx shx cp apps/multi-state/*.html dist/apps/multi-state && npx shx cp apps/input-num/*.html dist/apps/input-num && npx shx cp apps/multi-state/*.css dist/apps/multi-state && npx shx cp apps/input-num/*.css dist/apps/input-num && npx shx cp apps/input-num/*.json dist/apps/input-num
scripts.build: npm run build:cem:pre && npm run build:cem:analyze && npm run build:rm && npm run build:rollup && npm run build:cp

author: Sideways S.
